applicant-name.name: JIANGSU HAODUOSHOU AGRICULTURAL TECH CO LTD
江苏好多收农业科技有限公司

invention-title: Carbon-hydrogen-oxygen converting agent for promoting plant to absorb carbon, hydrogen and oxygen and preparation process
促进植物吸收碳氢氧的碳氢氧转化剂及制备工艺

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of plant growth promotion, and discloses a carbon-hydrogen-oxygen conversion agent for promoting plants to absorb carbon, hydrogen and oxygen and a preparation technology, the carbon-hydrogen-oxygen conversion agent comprises the following components by weight: 20%-25% of humic acid, 8%-15% of amino acid, 30%-45% of biomass, 8%-20% of an organosilicon compound, 8%-14% of a probiotic culture medium, and the balance of water. The humic acid is formed by decomposing humus and is used for promoting plants to absorb and utilize nutrients, and the main raw material of the biomass is one or a mixture of more than two of cellulose, hemicellulose and lignin and is used for providing energy and a carbon source for the plants. According to the invention, an organosilicon compound is fused into a preparation process of the carbon-hydrogen-oxygen conversion agent, and the carbon-hydrogen-oxygen conversion agent can comprise a diatomite extract, diatom acid salt and the like. The organosilicon compounds help plants to absorb carbon, hydrogen, oxygen and other elements, and improve the nutrient absorption efficiency. Compared with a traditional silicon conversion agent, the conversion agent prepared by the invention can more effectively provide nutrient elements required by plants.

本发明涉及植物生长促进技术领域，公开了促进植物吸收碳氢氧的碳氢氧转化剂及制备工艺，该碳氢氧转化剂由以下成分按重量百分比组成：腐殖酸：20％～25％，氨基酸：8％～15％，生物质30％～45％，有机硅化合物8％～20％，益生菌培养基8～14％，所述腐殖酸由腐殖质分解而来，用于促进植物对养分的吸收和利用，所述生物质主要原料为纤维素、半纤维素、木质素中的一种或者两种以上的混合物，用于为植物提供能量和碳源。本发明将有机硅化合物融入碳氢氧转化剂的制备工艺中，可包括硅藻土提取物、硅藻酸盐等。这些有机硅化合物有助于植物吸收碳、氢、氧等元素，提高养分吸收效率。与传统的硅素转化剂相比，本发明制备转化剂能够更有效地提供植物所需的营养元素。
